ing: 2 cups escarole - torn, rinsed and dried
2 cups romaine lettuce - torn, washed and dried
2 cups Bibb lettuce, rinsed and torn
1/4 cup low fat, low sodium chicken broth
n: Plum Tomato and Escarole Salad with Parmesan Balsamic Dressing
des: "High quality vinegar and oil will turn this leafy green salad into an Italian masterpiece.  Preparation time is 20 minutes. This recipe is from The WEBB Cooks, articles and recipes by Robyn Webb, courtesy of the American Diabetes Association."
ins:
In a salad bowl, combine the escarole, romaine, bibb lettuce and tomatoes.
Whisk together the vinegar, olive oil, cheese, garlic lemon juice, chicken broth and salt and pepper. Pour over salad, toss and serve.
